# MTA-STS Policy for thercsgroup.eu

This repository hosts the MTA-STS (Mail Transfer Agent Strict Transport Security) policy for thercsgroup.eu.

## Policy Details

- **Mode**: enforce
- **Max Age**: 7 days (604800 seconds)
- **MX Servers**: Google Workspace mail servers

## Policy URL

The policy is accessible at:
https://mta-sts.thercsgroup.eu/.well-known/mta-sts.txt

## What is MTA-STS?

MTA-STS is a security standard that ensures email is only sent over encrypted TLS connections to authorized mail servers, preventing man-in-the-middle attacks.
